name: Off-road Animal Transport
description:
Get your hands on multi truck driving adventure and complete the transportation task. For the offroad driving experience with uphill and downhill drive you will be transporting animals from zoo to farm and vice versa.

Features
• Real feel of driving a Heavy transporter truck
• Transport Different Animals on your Cargo Truck
• Amazing 3D graphics & Realistic Truck Driving
• Thrilling gameplay with Multiple Driving Jobs
• ultiple Off Road gameplay Scenarios
• Powerful off-road truck driving adventure
